sentence: At the rally she heard from local leaders and politicians too, like Congresswomen Madeleine Dean and Mary Gay Scanlon and Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro.
author: Beccah Hendrickson
title: Hundreds attend rally for Ukraine in Montgomery County

sentence: Candidates at Susquehanna Valley Conservatives Forum LEWISBURG – The current field of candidates for Governor and Lieutenant Governor on the crowded GOP ticket all agree on what’s at stake versus Josh Shapiro and state democrats…but that didn’t stop one gubernatorial candidate from taking a big shot at one current favorite.
author: WKOK Staff
title: At Local Forum, Gubernatorial Candidate Gale Calls Out Mastriano

sentence: Just as notable, it found 44% of those polled remain undecided as to who will get their vote in the primary to face off against presumed Democratic nominee Josh Shapiro, who is unopposed for his party’s nomination.
author: WKOK Staff
title: Report: Mastriano Leads in New Gov Poll, Barletta Falls Behind
